definition: to step across/to stride over/to straddle/to span
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

sentences.english: They passed the dry bed of a rivulet.
sentences.chinese: 他們跨過了一道乾涸的河牀。

sentences.english: It appears as a dusty, cloud-line across the sky.
sentences.chinese: 跨過夜空眼前是一條星星點點雲霧線。

sentences.english: After I crossed the threshold of the conference hall, I collapsed in the university hallway.
sentences.chinese: 跨過會議廳的門檻後，我就倒在了大學的走廊裏。

sentences.english: Is there some set-point which when crossed unleashes the evil?
sentences.chinese: 有沒有一個臨界點，當它被跨過之後就會釋放出邪惡？

sentences.english: The water ran down the street and crossed another street.
sentences.chinese: 水沿着街道一直衝下去，還跨過了另外一條街。

sentences.english: She opened the door, stepped over the lintel, and on to the damp, cold earth of the passage outside.
sentences.chinese: 她打開門，跨過門檻，踩到過廳潮溼的冰涼的地上。

sentences.english: He stepped lightly over the puddle.
Also in Fifteen-Thirteen, Vasco Nunez de Balboa crossed the Isthmus of Panama and reached the Pacific Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 同年，巴爾沃亞跨過了巴拿馬地峽到達了太平洋。

sentences.english: His Rockets never advanced further than the second round of the playoffs.
sentences.chinese: 他的火箭隊從來沒有跨過季後賽第二輪。

sentences.english: Never walk under or step over a tied lead rope.
sentences.chinese: 一定不要鑽過或跨過綁好的鉛繩。

sentences.english: According to legend, Paul Bunyan was a giant.
sentences.chinese: 保羅是個巨人，他只須邁一小步就能跨過三條街。

sentences.english: He endured hardships crossing the Mexico border to work in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 爲了到美國工作，他經受了跨過墨西哥邊境的艱辛。

sentences.english: Cross the heaviest thing in life with the most lightsome pace.
sentences.chinese: 用最輕盈的腳步跨過生命中最沉重的事情。

sentences.english: Reporters across the Silver Bridge to later see in the upstream water is indeed very clear.
sentences.chinese: 記者在跨過銀溪橋後見到，上游的水的確很清。

sentences.english: He strided across several rain puddle on his way home.
sentences.chinese: 他在回家的路上跨過了好幾個雨水坑。

sentences.english: Crossing the mountains, trading tea and salt with antlers and musks.
sentences.chinese: 跨過了千山萬嶺，馱走鹿茸麝香，換來鹽巴茶葉。
